name: Skipping Beats
description:
Here is my final project for my Intro to Game Design class, Skipping Beats! This project was my first real attempt at making a game, and as such, there are some notable difficulty curves and bugs. That being said, there are four levels to play, each of varying difficulty. I hope you enjoy it!

Controls:

A, D - Left and Right Movement

J - Basic Hop (and Wall Jump)

K - High Jump (and Wall Jump)

L - Long Jump

Music Used:

Lovely City by Calum Bowen
